alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 9:15PM CDT until June 03 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR ARMSTRONG...NORTHEASTERN RANDALL...CARSON...WESTERN GRAY... SOUTHEASTERN POTTER AND DONLEY COUNTIES... At 914 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Lefors to 6 miles northeast of Palo Duro Canyon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Pampa, Panhandle, Clarendon, Claude, White Deer, Groom, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake, Lake Mcclellan, Washburn, Goodnight, Kingsmill, Alanreed, Greenbelt Lake and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Potter; Randall
